description: Adds case event publishing configuration. For a complete list of fields you can add to the event message, see Create case fields in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Cases domain.

parameters.name: eventBridge
parameters.description: Configuration to enable EventBridge case event delivery and determine what data is delivered. Indicates whether the to broadcast case event data to the customer. includedData (dict) --- Details of what case and related item data is published through the case event stream. caseData (dict) --- Details of what case data is published through the case event stream. List of field identifiers. (dict) --- Object for unique identifier of a field. Unique identifier of a field. relatedItemData (dict) --- Details of what related item data is published through the case event stream. Details of what related item data is published through the case event stream.

nested_params.name: enabled
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the to broadcast case event data to the customer.

nested_params.name: includedData
nested_params.description: Details of what case and related item data is published through the case event stream.

nested_params.name: caseData
nested_params.description: Details of what case data is published through the case event stream.

nested_params.name: relatedItemData
nested_params.description: Details of what related item data is published through the case event stream.

nested_params.name: includeContent
nested_params.description: Details of what related item data is published through the case event stream.
